name: RaboK Knights
description:
• Dynamic JRPG-style battles, with a frontline and a rear line system, allowing some strategy.
  • Spells and other skills to unlock by spending "Career Points". Beware that powering up a skill you already have increase the resources needed to use or cast it.
  • Breakable and restorable weapons and armours.
  • Broken weapons can be restored (Work in progress, not really functional for now)

The whole thing is a work in progress, but this demo can be played nonetheless.
